description: Test cases for type unification operations

literal.string: Test cases for type unification operations
variable does not occur in different variable
variable does not occur in int32
variable does not occur in string
variable occurs in list element type
variable does not occur in list of different type
variable does not occur in function with different vars
variable occurs in map key type
variable occurs in map value type
variable occurs in list of functions
variable does not occur in complex type without it
variable occurs deep in complex type
variable occurs in forAll bound position
unify list of variables with list of int32
fail to unify int32 with string
fail to unify list with function
occur check: variable with list containing it
fail to join int32 with string
fail to join list with function
fail to join pair with either
